Class RunCLI

java.lang.Object
com.scivicslab.actoriac.cli.RunCLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
Callable<Integer>
public class RunCLI extends Object implements Callable<Integer>
CLI subcommand to execute actor-IaC workflows.

This is the main workflow execution command. It supports executing workflows defined in YAML, JSON, or XML format with optional overlay configuration.

Usage

actor-iac run -d /path/to/workflows -w main-workflow.yaml
actor-iac run --dir ./workflows --workflow deploy --threads 8
actor-iac run -d ./workflows -w deploy -i inventory.ini -g webservers
Since:
2.10.0
Author:
devteam@scivics-lab.com

    • call

      public Integer call()
      Executes the workflow.
      Specified by:
      call in interface Callable<Integer>
      Returns:
      exit code (0 for success, non-zero for failure)

    • suppressConsoleOutput

      private void suppressConsoleOutput()
      Suppresses all console output (stdout/stderr) for quiet mode.

    • setupLogDatabase

      private void setupLogDatabase() throws SQLException
      Sets up H2 database for distributed logging.

      Connection priority:

      1. If --embedded is specified, use embedded mode
      2. If --log-serve is specified, connect to that server
      3. Otherwise (default): auto-detect or start a background TCP server with auto-shutdown
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • startBackgroundLogServer

      private int startBackgroundLogServer(Path dbPath)
      Starts a background H2 log server with auto-shutdown.

      The server runs in a separate process and will automatically shut down when there are no connections for 5 minutes.

      Parameters:
      dbPath - database path
      Returns:
      the TCP port of the started server, or -1 if failed

    • findAvailablePort

      private int findAvailablePort()
      Finds an available port in the actor-IaC reserved range (29090-29100).

    • findActorIacScript

      private String findActorIacScript()
      Finds the path to the actor_iac.java script.

    • setupTextLogging

      private void setupTextLogging() throws IOException
      Sets up text file logging via H2LogStore.

      This method configures the H2LogStore to also write log entries to a text file, in addition to the H2 database.

      Throws:
      IOException
